name: Another Hero
description:
WARNING: This is my first project and it is in the development phase, I hope you enjoy it, I will be improving and bringing new content with time.

Another Hero is a Visual Novel where it tells the story of 2 protagonists with different visions depending on which player to choose, in which their life is totally changed by discovering their true past and trying to solve everything that occurs once and for all. The Visual Novel will take place in different worlds with different races where the player can choose with whom to ally and relate. 

Support Me !

https://www.patreon.com/echowix
